items.name: Pubget
items.summary: is a command-line tool to download articles from PubMed Central, extract their content and prepare it for analysis.

items.name: Labelbuddy
items.summary: is an effective and flexible tool for labelling text. It is a local, lightweight application, easy to install, relies on standard formats and offers a graphical and a command-line interface

items.name: Labelbuddy-annotations
items.summary: is a repository of annotations created with labelbuddy, on documents collected with pubget. It contains thousands of annotations and Python utilities to facilitate their use.
